At this point, a small piece of parchment still bound contains an unidentifiable fragment of an ornamental capital in blue ink, touched with red. Beneath it, presumably the following line is a capital "A", touched with red. Were these remnants to be lineated, they would presumably be lines 103-104, and this is indicated in their @xml:id, albeit with a suffix "a" so that the current lineation can be preserved. If Horstmann transcribed these fragments, they were lost in our OCR.
